name: Vicious Jellies
description:
Dear all mighty animal-lovers of the Earth, animals are in danger!

Endangered species all around the world were discovered suffering an anonymous disease known to be caused by vicious jellies.

These malicious jelly viruses are fiercely attacking our lovely animals at the moment and we have NO TIME!
It is time for YOU to become our finger-ranger to save the very last hope on Earth. Mission is heavy, but we have seen the hope in your finger.

It will grow hard and strong as you travel. May the pills be with you.
